entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • F# program fails with an unprintable exception when `FSharp.Core` is not referenced. #104528
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding methods to the HTTP Client factory that receive Type parameters instead of generic type parameters #104525
  • [browser-wasm] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests failure ("Why are we setting the target on an unoccupied slot?") #104524
  • [browser-wasm] PhysicalFileProviderTests test failure #104523
  • Loongarch/riscV: ThreadLocal optimization during JIT should detect static/dynamic resolver #104518

Closed

  • wrong type when creating a generic whith nullable properties and using it with an enum #104526
  • TraceListener.TraceOptions ignores TraceOutputOptions.LogicalOperationStack #23515
    Future
  • Struct with self-referencing `ImmutableArray` static field causes `TypeLoadException` #104519

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't call fcntl on an invalid file descriptor. #104535
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • illumos: set default timezone info path #104533
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Report EH clauses to runtime in order of increasing try region index #104531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ignore type resolution failures when filtering for custom attributes with a sealed type. #104530
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Define _REENTRANT for SUNOS #104527
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Allow pushing constants to the right for simd comparisons #104515
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Use `XmlResolverIsNetworkingEnabledByDefault` property in `AotCompilerCommon.props` #104520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove link to fixed GitHub issue #104521
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Add some helper functions for getting the intrinsic ID to use for a given oper #104498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP] a different way to calculation unusable frag for DATAS #104291
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2490057 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary to avoid threading issues #104407
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix syntax of exports file with no exported symbols on Linux #104339
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators #104506
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in BigInteger.IsPowerOfTwo #104513
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [build.ps1] Set the default architecture using an environment variable #104474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Assertion prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `BBF_FAILED_VERIFICATION` and `BBF_FUNCLET_BEG` #93483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104514
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Fix GatherPrefetch and Prefetch APIs #104494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Checksum links in https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/blob/main/documentation/package-table.md#table fail #42008
  • Problem with LibraryImport Generated Code #42005

Closed

  • First-chance ArgumentOutOfRangeException in NuGetUtils.cs line #2183
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.7.24357.1 #42007
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42006
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused NuGetUtils.cs file #41987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix workload install or update with workload set specified in global.json #41983
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2490009 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Error NU1107 Version conflict detected for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common #31441

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed grammar in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74279
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56660
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #56658
  • Add a feature to Server-driven, client-rendered applications just like Hybirdly. #56657

Updated

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, plaintext #56604
  • PolicyEvaluator doesn't have correct logic #56656
  • MaximumParallelInvocationsPerClient > 1 breaks file upload in Blazor Server mode #53951
    9.0-rc2
  • Improve interaction between enhanced nav and scroll position #51646
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Announcement: Swashbuckle.AspNetCore is being removed in .NET 9 #54599
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56649
  • WebApplicationFactory Client returns NotFound for all requests with Overriding Configure method #45372
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to execute command for SwipeItem with screen reader on Android #23478
  • [Android] Layouting issues inside CarouselView DataTemplate #23475
  • unable to debug android apps on Linux #23472

Closed

  • Frame with custom ControlTemplate not rendering #23476
  • File picker multi select #14996
    Under Consideration

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] CarouselView: Changing Position after navigation away then comi… #23477
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    community ✨
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton

Updated

  • Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Non-Nullable String Column added after table creation also adds default value #34178
  • Json parse error while using /login method from WebApiCore Identity provided by microsoft.aspnetcore.identity.entityframeworkcore@8.0.6 #34177
  • Cosmos: Inherit partition key definition from parent by convention #34176

Closed

  • Make GUID keys auto-generated in Cosmos even if a partition key is used #33961
  • OwnedType does not work with type configured with .ToSqlQuery #34160
  • EF Core 8 query causing intensive performance drop due to the breaking "contians" change #34170

PullRequests

Merged

  • Improve `String_Contains_Column` test #34174

Updated

  • Cosmos: Stop nesting results in extra JSON object #34044
    blocked
  • Implement `CASE` flattening optimizations #34175
  • Don't use service discovery for DbContext types if corresponding IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementations are found. #34082
